name: Death Sworn
description: The underworld stirs with ominous activity. Death marshals its subjects for a new plan of terrifying design, one that will require the souls of every mortal.

skinlines.name: Death Sworn
skinlines.description: Eager to claim more souls for the underworld, Death sends the souls of fallen warriors as Death Sworn back to the mortal plane, where they serve their master's terrible bidding with relish.
